name: KajalConversation
_source: s;Simon;Kajal. What are you looking for?
s;Kajal;I am merely browsing. Nothing has yet to catch my eye.
s;Kajal;Though, I did hear that you are engaged.
s;Simon;That's no secret. Lord Morrissey has arranged a marriage between Anuki and I.
s;Kajal;Such an arrangement is quite disadvantageous for you.|As you know, the family name is passed matrilinearly-|Your children will be Morrisseys, with Verstadt titles.
s;Simon;I am aware. Still, it was the only realistic choice.|I need Lord Morrissey's help to retake my lands.
s;Kajal;Quite true. You are pragmatic, Lord Verstadt.|I admire that.
